requirements.title: New project dialog opens from primary entry points
requirements.description: Verifies the modal opens via the "Create Project" button, keyboard shortcuts, and toolbar menu so operators can begin authoring without page reloads.

validation.notes: BAS workflow asserting modal visibility for each trigger once exported.

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Visual workflow builder
requirements.title: New project dialog closes through all affordances
requirements.description: Ensures the modal dismisses through the X button, cancel button, backdrop click, and Escape key, restoring the underlying canvas state.

validation.notes: BAS workflow covering dismissal affordances (pending export).

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Visual workflow builder
requirements.title: Operators can create a project from the dialog
requirements.description: Confirms validated submissions persist projects, show success toasts, and refresh the project list with the new entry selected.

validation.notes: BAS workflow seeds unique project and checks API/UI consistency (pending export).

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Visual workflow builder
requirements.title: Project creation enforces inline validation rules
requirements.description: Covers empty name, duplicate detection, and invalid characters with accessible error messaging surfaced inside the dialog.

validation.notes: BAS workflow submits failing payloads and asserts inline error copy (pending export).
